[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gnaudio/jabra-js](./jabra-js.md) &gt; [ISingleInitialState](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.md) &gt; [muted](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.muted.md)

## ISingleInitialState.muted property

`true` to mute the device and `false` to unmute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
muted?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Can only be set to `true` if [ISingleInitialState.callActive](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.callactive.md) is also set to `true`<!-- -->.
